data.Actor: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo
data.Title: The Avengers
data.Description: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!

data.Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
data.Description: Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from the high-stakes of being a super-hero. When he asks for help from Doctor Strange the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

data.Actor: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo
data.Title: Avengers: Infinity War
data.Description: As the Avengers and their allies have continued to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger has emerged from the cosmic shadows: Thanos. A despot of intergalactic infamy, his goal is to collect all six Infinity Stones, artifacts of unimaginable power, and use them to inflict his twisted will on all of reality. Everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment - the fate of Earth and existence itself has never been more uncertain.

data.Actor: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett
data.Title: Thor: Ragnarok
data.Description: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his home-world and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of a powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

data.Actor: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo
data.Title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
data.Description: When Tony Stark tries to jumpstart a dormant peacekeeping program, things go awry and Earth’s Mightiest Heroes are put to the ultimate test as the fate of the planet hangs in the balance. As the villainous Ultron emerges, it is up to The Avengers to stop him from enacting his terrible plans, and soon uneasy alliances and unexpected action pave the way for an epic and unique global adventure.

data.Actor: Benedict Cumberbatch, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams
data.Title: Doctor Strange
data.Description: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

data.Actor: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo
data.Title: Avengers: Endgame
data.Description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins due to the efforts of the Mad Titan, Thanos. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe once and for all, no matter what consequences may be in store.

data.Actor: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston
data.Title: Thor
data.Description: Against his father Odin's will, The Mighty Thor - a powerful but arrogant warrior god - recklessly reignites an ancient war. Thor is cast down to Earth and forced to live among humans as punishment. Once here, Thor learns what it takes to be a true hero when the most dangerous villain of his world sends the darkest forces of Asgard to invade Earth.

data.Actor: Benedict Cumberbatch, Elizabeth Olsen, Chiwetel Ejiofor
data.Title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
data.Description: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the Multiverse to confront a mysterious new adversary.

data.Actor: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr.
data.Title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
data.Description: Following the events of Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker, with the help of his mentor Tony Stark, tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens, New York City, with fighting crime as his superhero alter ego Spider-Man as a new threat, the Vulture, emerges.

data.Actor: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston
data.Title: Thor: The Dark World
data.Description: Thor fights to restore order across the cosmos… but an ancient race led by the vengeful Malekith returns to plunge the universe back into darkness. Faced with an enemy that even Odin and Asgard cannot withstand, Thor must embark on his most perilous and personal journey yet, one that will reunite him with Jane Foster and force him to sacrifice everything to save us all.
